name: funtodo
text: The Fugue really is a bit of a showman.

name: xud
text: Nonsense The Fug and I go way back.  His methods are just misunderstood

name: spinynorman
text: The word Fugue used to be about Bach, to me. Now, between this and GOF, it's synonymous with street-level gangland violence.

name: bixschmix
text: Please, someone, go [url=http://www.nononsenseselfdefense.com/NNSDknivesfull.htm]purchase "Knives, Knife Fights and Related Hassles" by Marc "Animal" Macyoung. It is completely serious. It is completely hilarious. It is a book that Todd would make his bible and bookmark with entrails.

name: bixschmix
text: Or... here!

name: sdskyle
text:
the url changed. now it is here:
http://www.nononsenseselfdefense.com/knifefighting.html

name: poodlelucy
text: i just hope people are pronouncing it right. it pains me to think someone is saying "fuh-gyoo"

name: deusoma
text:
Personally I always thought it was fun to say.
Fyooooooguh .

name: shutup_shutup
text:
It's pronounced "foo-gway," right?

Right?

name: fancypants
text: fyoog

name: ih8jonmayr
text: Yes, just like how "queue" is pronounced "kway-way"

name: wonelove
text:
It's a...fuh-gyoo Friday?
Eh?

name: rayonatoilet
text:
Anybody else think that "The Fugue" was in the GOF at some point?

MAYBE he gained his name and his prison time by loosing it.

MAYBE THE FUGUE IS FAUNTLEROY BROWN.

name: atticusonline
text: Oh fug it.

name: sixtyswine
text: The Fug is what I want to be called when I grow up.

name: sp1derbaby
text: The Fugue is like the Steve Vai of shanking.

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by pmoney187, Thorfinn, kazad, bug, equinn2006, davidbs, CarlG, sid, Zem, Boyd, Carten)

name: zem
text: The... "Halo hump"?

name: phoenixultima
text: That's where you crouch down and stand up while standing over someone's face, like you're teabagging them. So called because it's a popular move in multiplayer Halo matches. Could also be called the Counterstrike hump.

name: saint
text: I concede to defeat. i was quite inebriated at the time. I apologize. Please don't shank me.

name: davidbs
text: If Nice Pete knows one thing in this world, it's how to critique a shanking. In this, Todd comes across as the Inigo Montoya of the pint-sized shanker's world.

name: norrin
text: If Nice Pete knows one thing, it's how to murder people. If he knows two things, it's how to murder people and critique a shanking.

name: evilbobikus
text: Nice Pete is seriously who almost everyone I hung out with grew up to be.  I've had similar conversations to this with people while tending to a stab wound.

name: tourach3
text: chubby for weaving in a princess bride reference

name: trevor328
text: Is Lawrence Ferlinghetti a well known figure in shanking circles? I only know of his poetry, but I might have a lot more respect for him now.

name: zem
text: Pat assumes Nice Pete will kill anyone he asks him to, just 'cause Nice Pete kills guys sometimes.

name: nathanielperson
text:
"Killin' is a special thing

It's a special thing you do

when you want someone to die "

I'm constantly amazed that Pat has known Nice Pete for so long and is still alive. I really can't explain it. Maybe Nice Pete feels he owes Pat some gratitude for something?

name: tellumo
text: I think Nice Pete has read that when it gets raw, Pat will crack like a store-brand breadstick and completely go house on everything in the vicinity. He doesn't want to mess with that.

name: nathanielperson
text: Man, you're probably right. Good call.

name: vweep
text: Chubby for choice of phrase. :)

name: tragicone
text: I dunno. I think he tolerates pat as a woman.

name: atypicaloracle
text: You'd think he'd just do the world a favorite and cut the jerk's throat before then, you know, as a right-minded and honest man should.

name: honesttom
text: We know that when someone does Pete a huge favour, he considers himself in their debt - maybe it's because Pat got him out of jail.

name: peterjoel
text: Pat also does not understand that Nice Pete is far too classy to step on a squirrel. His methods are far more interesting that. And his motives must be pure.

name: riazm
text: Does Nice Pete wear Converse?

name: djwhiterabbit
text: apparently he does.

name: stevegt500
text: you can see them clearer at the end of the mr band arc when ray considers wearing his leg as a hat

name: petitegitan
text: Pat's first reaction is always murder.

name: stuart
text: "Roast Beef threatened to sexually assault me" -> "I need to borrow your gun"

name: epicurus
text: Brilliant. I love the analysis of shanking technique. Would do business again!

name: iloveyoucupcake
text: Todd is so classy

name: skoora
text: No, man, Todd has no class at all. Nice Pete told him that to get into his head. Nice Pete will kill Todd.

name: jujubeesforjesus
text: Two experts, discussing their work with reverence, ignore the shanked cat.

name: 1000hz
text: Todd has a go-to shank.

name: deancain29
text: thats the part where I sicked up my coffee with laughter. I tell people I have a 'go-to shank' - they look at me like I just showed them a shit card trick.

name: lateadopter
text: Todd is a recognized leader in several fields . Stammering and getting terror-laid on a regular basis have not kept him down.

name: brah_angelico
text: I like how Todd stops stuttering once you get him talking about advanced shankin' theory

name: deancain29
text: Shank connisieurs (sp)

name: charchar
text:
connoisseurs.
Sorry. I have an etymology fetish.

name: i_love_kate
text: I think there's a cream for that.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
hotttttttt
(me too. i mean this strip is so good and so funny)

name: darthemed
text: I love the Todd & Nice Pete dynamic. Wish it showed up more often.

name: jerkface
text: Whenever I'm down, I think 'go-to shank'. Usually does the trick.

name: helloftubby
text: class is the most highly regarded of traits in achewood.

name: dougthehead
text: Anyone else notice that Todd's technique was patented by Simon Little?  I always wondered what happened to him after he went driving off after that bird.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Ray: Time to Pah-Tay with Ruh-Ay!
Philippe: I need to admit that I did a bad job.

name: saddestking
text: Philippe is really bad at eating breakfast

name: direhaggis
text: Nice Pete subtly agrees that Pat needed to be shanked given the nasty chocolates and Moby circumstances.

name: tekende
text: If Todd wanted Nice Pete's opinion he would cut open Pete's skull, eat his brain, and crap his opinion back into his skull.

name: swatson
text: The shank with the greatest deal of class, belongs to Todd.

name: drago25
text: Count on Achewood for an intelligent discussion of the nature of the shank

name: unsentletter
text: Wait... who invited Nice Pete?

name: tekende
text: Who's going to tell him to leave?

name: fineoakstructure
text: Blister.

name: latterman
text: Simon Little is the evil counterpart to Nate Small and his "Patented Defensive against the Little".

name: retinarow
text: This is the only classy thing Todd has ever done ever.

name: redheron
text:
I am an artist, and I hate it when people ask me to draw things for them.

I imagine this is the same way Nice Pete feels when people flippantly ask him to kill a person for them.

name: genequagmire
text:
DA FUG!

cwutididder
